about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a villager?

My Village Life gives this feeling into your hands. Quests from other dwellers with different rewards. Grow your own crops in your garden, chop wood then sell it for great money. The game has several obtainable vehicles for different purposes.

The tavern is open 7/24, giving you enough time to get drunk and won't be able to go home. If alcohol didn't catch you, there are other activities, like hunting, fishing, forest jobs, farming jobs, run businesses, helping people or discovering the secrets that the village holds.

Features:

  • Open world gameplay, much to explore,large map with various weather and exciting cave system and with various weather

  • Living nature with pigs, deers, rabbits, birds, bears and other animals

  • Many cars, motorbikes, bus, trucks, tractors, airplane, trailers, agricultural tools and other are available to drive and use

  • Customizing vehicles with permormance, cosmetic and painting options

  • Several and varied quests and missions to help your villager friends and get some money

  • Discover the secrets of your family and get to the end of the main story

  • Become a rally racer and get yourself into the mud to win Top Beer's TSD rallies

  • Run businesses to outgrow your village and be a millionaire

  • Cruise around on the map in winter season and do Christmas jobs

  • Find all hidden vehicle parts and finish that someone had started

Co-op mode is evolve the gameplay to higher experience. Now our lonely villager can make his job with his (alkoholic) friends. This mode open much opportunity to have fun in the game and it will increasing by all added missions in the future. You can make 2, 4 or 6 max players rooms for your friends and you can pick of public or private rooms.

Let's jump in it together and find all secrets of this seems peaceful village!

About the Game

Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a villager?

My Village Life gives this feeling into your hands. Quests from other dwellers with different rewards. Grow your own crops in your garden, chop wood then sell it for great money. The game has several obtainable vehicles for different purposes.

The tavern is open 7/24, giving you enough time to get drunk and won't be able to go home. If alcohol didn't catch you, there are other activities, like hunting, fishing, forest jobs, farming jobs, run businesses, helping people or discovering the secrets that the village holds.

Features:

  • Open world gameplay, much to explore,large map with various weather and exciting cave system and with various weather

  • Living nature with pigs, deers, rabbits, birds, bears and other animals

  • Many cars, motorbikes, bus, trucks, tractors, airplane, trailers, agricultural tools and other are available to drive and use

  • Customizing vehicles with permormance, cosmetic and painting options

  • Several and varied quests and missions to help your villager friends and get some money

  • Discover the secrets of your family and get to the end of the main story

  • Become a rally racer and get yourself into the mud to win Top Beer's TSD rallies

  • Run businesses to outgrow your village and be a millionaire

  • Cruise around on the map in winter season and do Christmas jobs

  • Find all hidden vehicle parts and finish that someone had started

Co-op mode is evolve the gameplay to higher experience. Now our lonely villager can make his job with his (alkoholic) friends. This mode open much opportunity to have fun in the game and it will increasing by all added missions in the future. You can make 2, 4 or 6 max players rooms for your friends and you can pick of public or private rooms.

Let's jump in it together and find all secrets of this seems peaceful village!

name: My Village Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: +3 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 4500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: +3 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: My Village Life is a open world village simulator vehicle driving game.
supported_languages:
English, Hungarian*, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Russian, Polish
*languages with full audio support
